name: Text Fill
description:
Steps to use:

  • Select the text you want to use as a fill
  • Hold down Shift and select the shape you want to fill
  • Press the “Create” button


note: the plugin won’t run if you hit the Enter or Return key on your keyboard


For the best results:

  • You only select 1 text node and 1 shape before running the plugin
  • You use 1 line of text
  • You use a closed shape, i.e. you shouldn’t use a line as your shape
  • If you use a vector network as your shape, make sure it has a fill before you run the plugin
